English: Have to draw... more... Have to draw...
Chinese: 得繼續畫才行……得畫更多才行……得繼續畫才行……
Korean: 그려야 해… 더 그려야 해… 그려야 해…
German: Mehr ... zeichnen ... Muss mehr zeichnen ...

English:
The bookseller?!
The florist?!
Chinese:
書店店員！？
花店店員！？
Korean:
서점 점원 씨!?
꽃집 점원 씨!?
German:
Die Buchhändlerin?!
Die Floristin?!

English: No. Frickin'. Way.
Chinese: 什麼……不會吧……？
Korean: 무슨… 거짓말, 이지…
German: Nicht im Ernst.

English: YOU'RE the culprit behind those disappearances?!
Chinese: 「妳」就是神秘失蹤事件的……犯人……！？
Korean: 「당신」이 행방불명의… 범인, 이야…!?
German:
DU bist verantwortlich für die verschwundenen
Leute?!

English:
Oh my, Sanada? Is that you, Sanada?
Yay, it's Sanada! It's really Sanada!
Chinese:
哎呀，真田……？你是真田嗎？
哇！是真田！真的是真田……！
Korean:
어머, 사나다 군…? 에, 사나다 군이야?
와아, 사나다 군! 진짜 사나다 군이야…!
German:
Ach, Arata? Bist du es, Sanada?
Juhu, es ist Sanada! Es ist wirklich Sanada!

English: Nishino, seriously? What are you doing?
Chinese: 「西野」小姐……不會吧……妳在做什麼……？
Korean: 「니시노」씨… 진짜냐고… 뭘 하고, 있는 거야…?
German: Nishino, ganz ernsthaft! Was tust du da?

English:
You can't tell by looking?
I'm drawing a manga! Here, lookit! Lookit!
Chinese:
你看不出來嗎？
我在畫漫畫啊！你看……你看！你看！
Korean:
뭐냐니… 보면 몰라?
나, 만화를 그리고 있어! 자… 봐봐, 자!
German:
Sieht man das nicht?
Ich zeichne ein Manga! Hier, schau! Schau!

English:
Look, look, look, look! See how much I've done?
I've been able to draw as much as I want!
Chinese:
你看！你看你看你看！我畫了這麼多！
我可以盡情畫出這麼多……！
Korean:
봐봐, 이것 좀 봐봐! 이렇게나, 이렇게나!
이렇게나, 내가 생각한 대로 그려져…!
German:
Schau, schau, schau! Siehst du, wie viel ich
geschafft habe? Ich konnte so viel zeichnen, wie
ich wollte!

English:
It's not fanfic! It's original work!
It's 100% completely original!
Chinese:
這不是二次創作……全部都是原創的！
這些都是完完全全的原創作品！！
Korean:
2차 창작이 아니야… 오리지널이라구!?
완전히, 유일무이야!!
German:
Das ist kein Fanfiction! Das ist ein Original!
Ein hundertprozentiges Originalwerk!

English: Nishino...
Chinese: 西野小姐……
Korean: 니시노 씨…
German: Nishino ...

English:
How is it?! What do you think, Sanada?
I-I'm incredible, aren't I?
Chinese:
如何？你覺得怎麼樣？真田！？
我很厲害吧……！？
Korean:
어때!? 어때, 사나다 군!?
괴, 굉장하지, 나…!?
German:
Wie sieht es aus?! Was meinst du, Arata?
I-Ich bin großartig, oder nicht?

English:
If I can draw this well, I should have no problem
breaking into the industry and becoming a pro!
Chinese:
我那麼會畫，出道應該不成問題吧……！？
我應該可以成為職業漫畫家吧！？
Korean:
이렇게나 그릴 수 있으면, 아무 문제 없이 데뷔할 수 있겠지…!?
프로 만화가가 될 수 있겠지!?
German:
Wenn ich das gut zeichne, sollte ich meinen
Durchbruch schaffen und zum Profi werden!

English:
You say you're drawing a manga? I don't get it.
How is that a manga?
Chinese:
妳說妳在畫漫畫……？
莫名其妙……再說，這哪裡是漫畫啊？
Korean:
만화를 그리고 있다, 고…?
영문을 모르겠어… 그게, 어딜 봐서 만화야?
German:
Du sagst, du zeichnest ein Manga? Versteh ich
nicht. Was ist denn daran ein Manga?

English: Seriously, I'm not laughing.
Chinese: 完全笑不出來！
Korean: 웃을 수가 없는데, 진짜로
German: Im Ernst. Ich finde das nicht zum Lachen.

English: Even you're trashing my manga, Sanada.
Chinese: 居然連真田都貶低我的漫畫。
Korean: …사나다 군도, 내 만화를 욕하는구나
German: Sogar du redest mein Manga schlecht, Arata.

English:
I knew that would be your reaction.
I knew it.
Chinese:
果然……
果然是這樣……
Korean:
역시, 그렇구나…
그렇구나……
German:
Ich wusste, dass du so reagierst.
Ich wusste es einfach.

English:
Whoa, that Digimon!
Why the heck is it so darn big?!
Chinese:
那隻數碼寶貝……！？
體積大得不像話！！
Korean:
앗, 저 디지몬은…!?
그보다 대체 뭐야, 저 터무니없는 크기는!?
German:
Boah, das Digimon!
Warum zum Henker ist das so groß?!

English: You're the same as the others, Sanada.
Chinese: 真田，你也跟那群人一樣……
Korean: 사나다 군도, 그 녀석들과 똑같구나…
German: Du bist genau wie die anderen, Arata.

English:
You ignore, then insult... my... work, then you
trample all over... my... dreams, laughing, and
shaming me...
Chinese:
無意義地、貶低、我的、作品……妨礙、我的、夢想……
看不起我、嘲笑我、羞辱我……
Korean:
나의, 작품을, 무의미하게, 욕하고, 나의, 꿈을, 방해하고
바보 취급하고, 비웃고, 창피 주고―
German:
Du beachtest mich nicht, beschimpfst meine Arbeit,
trampelst dann lachend auf ... meinen Träumen
herum und machst mich runter ...

English: You smile and go on living as if nothing happened.
Chinese: 然後還若無其事地笑著、活著。
Korean: 아무 일도 없었던 것처럼, 웃으면서, 살아가는구나
German:
Dann grinst du und machst weiter, als ob nichts
gewesen ist.

English:
Uh oh, [p].
I think she's missing a few screws.
Chinese: [p]……這傢伙不妙！
Korean: [p]… 이거, 위험하겠는걸
German:
Oha, [p].
Ich glaube, die hat ein paar Schrauben locker.

English:
But I wiped the smirks off their faces.
Here, whatever I say, goes.
Chinese:
是我讓他們笑不出來的……
在這裡的話，一切都能如我所願……
Korean:
나, 그 녀석들을, 웃을 수 없게 해 줬어…
여기서는, 뭐든지 내 마음대로… 돼
German:
Aber das Grinsen ist ihnen allen vergangen.
Hier habe ich die Zügel in der Hand.

English:
Whatever I draw in my manga becomes true.
You won't be laughing at me for long, Sanada.
Chinese:
我畫的漫畫……都會成真。
真田，我也要讓你笑不出來。
Korean:
만화로 그린 것이… 현실이 돼
사나다 군도, 웃을 수 없게 해 줄게
German:
Was ich in meinem Manga zeichne, wird wahr.
Lange lachst du nicht mehr, Arata.

English:
Of course, I won't kill anyone.
After all, once my manga is complete...
Chinese:
可是，我絕對不會殺了你。
因為等我的漫畫完成後……
Korean:
하지만… 절대로, 죽이거나 하지는 않아?
왜냐면, 내 만화가 완성하면…
German:
Natürlich töte ich niemanden.
Sobald mein Manga fertig ist ...

English:
...I'll need you guys to be my readers!
You will be utter captives to my comic brilliance!
Chinese:
我要你們……我要你們成為我的讀者……！
成為我漫畫的俘虜……！
Korean:
너희들이… 너희들이, 내 독자가…!
내 만화의 포로가…! 되야 하니까…!
German:
... braucht es euch schließlich als Leser!
Ihr werdet meinem Comictalent ausgeliefert sein!

English:
Now could you please be quiet until I'm done?
Please, until it's ready, don't look at anything!
Chinese:
所以在那之前……拜託！不要多嘴！
拜託！在那之前，什麼都不要看！
Korean:
그때까지, 부탁이야, 입 다물고 있어 줘?
부탁이야, 그때까지, 아무것도 보지 말아 줘?
German:
Könntet ihr jetzt bitte ruhig sein, bis ich fertig
bin? Bitte nicht hinschauen, bis es fertig ist!

English:
Don't look, don't look, don't look, don't look
don'tlookdon'tlookdon'tlookdon'tlook...
Chinese:
不要看！不要看！不要看！不要看！
不要看不要看不要看不要看——
Korean:
보지 말아 줘, 보지 말아 줘, 보지 말아 줘, 보지 말아 줘
보지말아줘보지말아줘보지말아줘보지말아줘보지말아줘―
German:
Nicht hinschauen!
Nicht hinschauen, nicht hinschauen ...

English: DON'TLOOOOOOK!!!
Korean: 보지 말아 줘―――――!!
German: NICHT HINSCHAUEN!!!
